name: Overloaded (Frogs2 Game Jam)
description:
Background

This game was a prototype made in 3 days for the Frogs2 Mini-Jam (https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-106-frogs). It combines the process of Overcooked with a TPS. Inspired by: https://www.reddit.com/r/gameideas/comments/ortzrd/overcooked_style_wave_based_s...

Version

1.0.0

Controls
  • Left-click: shoot
  • Right-click: aim
  • R: reload
  • Q: drop item
  • Space: jump
  • E: interact with drops and machines
  • Escape: pause
Secret Controls (may cause instability)
  • F5: infinite ammo
  • F7: start wave early
Goal

Create ammo and weapons from the boxes on the floor and what the frog enemies drop to survive as long as possible. You have limited time to craft before enemies spawn so use it wisely or end up inhaled by frogs! Note that certain parts can only go in certain machines, and not all parts go together!

(Recipe hint: gunpowder + bullet casings + bullet tips = ammo!)
